name: Game Find differences
description:
Game find the difference

Look at the 2 images and find the differences. Similar images have slightly different graphic elements. Family game will be interesting for both children and adults. The original puzzle game is 2018. It's fun for your leisure. Train your memory and attention.

Rules of the game:

Look at the 2 pictures. Find the difference and click on it. The level is passed when all the differences are found. You can see how many remains to find differences, under the pictures.
